name: Telum
description:
The demons have returned, more powerful and numerical than ever. Return to the infested space station and clear out the hellish nightmares, but beware; you might yourself become damned in the process! 

Telum offers new abilities, more enemies and items, and more mechanics. It's an old school rogue-lite experience, with exclusive music and art. Unlock items and beat three different modes!

Telum is the sequel to our previous rogue-lite BadAss, that released for android.
